poem:
Title: "The Waking Dream of Peace"

Under the hum of distant drones,
the Persian sky weaves tales anew.
A thunderbolt, from falcon claws,
echoes in the hush of the desert rue.

The dance of shadow and flame commence,
as satellites cross in twilight's thrall.
Yet hope inscribes in stardust plain,
a shared tomorrow for us all.

In this fragile dance of power and pain,
may peace yet learn to rise again.
